item.description:
We know its short notice, but we just couldn’t help ourselves!

Things to Do Boston has put together a special night at Vintage Lounge in honor of all those who practice law here in Bean Town.

Don’t be alarmed if you haven’t passed the bar – this party is opened to everyone! Come by and grab a drink with other young professionals and possibly learn a thing or two about our justice system.
There will be free appetizers, giveaways and an open bar for the first hour with our sponsored drinks. So don’t be late!

Vintage Lounge is a great location with a wonderful atmosphere in which to relax and let go of your work day stress. In addition, you will have an opportunity to select from their extensive wine list and seasonal cocktail menu.

Let us treat you to good people, free stuff and lots of fun!


Suggested Attire: Business Casual
item.name: Things To Do Boston Happy Hour Party
